full_text:
Fwd: Re: Quick question.
From Lee Plourde
To BOP-IPP/PublicAffairs@bop.gov
Date 2019/08/13 08:26
Subject: Fwd: Re: Quick question.
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Understood, and thank you.
>>> BOP-IPP/Public Affairs 8/13/2019 8:24 AM >>>
This came to our email intake box- just confirming that we are Not discussing anything with reporters. Please forward inquiries from national press so we are aware and can respond as normal (Central office handles National press inquiries). Thanks much!
Office of Public Affairs
Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 514-6551 - phone
(202) 514-6620 - fax
>>> [redacted] @cbsnews.com> 8/12/2019 10:52 PM >>>
Lee, would you call me please?
[redacted]
Senior Producer, Investigative Unit
CBS News
C: 917-714[redacted]

Thank you. Lee what is your cell number?
